## Translator.getTranslationFromRecord() method

Gets a translation value from object using this translator's locale string as a key. Tries to get result by a default locale key if this translator's key was not found.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getTranslationFromRecord(obj: Partial<Record<LocaleString, any>>): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  obj | Partial&lt;Record&lt;LocaleString, any&gt;&gt; | Object to get value from. |

**Returns:**

any

Value from object or undefined.
